body:
You can create another overload for RunTest that takes multiple "x_shapes" like here in array_grad_test: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/gradients/array_grad_test.cc#L44

This should allow you to just specify shapes for the inputs and run one RunTest. Here is an example of a test that does that: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/gradients/array_grad_test.cc#L56

This should allow you to just specify shapes for the inputs and run one RunTest. Here is an example of a test that does that: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/gradients/array_grad_test.cc#L56
